text: Myriam Verreault is a Canadian film director and screenwriter.Éric Moreault, "Myriam Verreault: Construire un pont entre les nations". Le Soleil, September 27, 2019. She is most noted for her 2019 film Kuessipan, for which she received a Canadian Screen Award nomination for Best Adapted Screenplay at the 8th Canadian Screen Awards,"Écrans canadiens : Song of Names, The Twentieth Century et Antigone en tête des nominations". Ici Radio-Canada, February 18, 2020. and two Prix Iris nominations for Best Director and Best Screenplay at the 22nd Quebec Cinema Awards."Les femmes brillent aux nominations du Gala Québec Cinéma". Ici Radio-Canada, April 23, 2020. Her other works have included the documentary film West of Pluto (À l'ouest de Pluton) and the web documentary My Tribe Is My Life (Ma tribu c'est ma vie). ==See also== * List of female film and television directors ==References== ==External links== * Category:21st-century Canadian screenwriters Category:21st-century Canadian women writers Category:Canadian documentary film directors Category:Canadian women film directors Category:Canadian screenwriters in French Category:Film directors from Quebec Category:Writers from Quebec Category:French Quebecers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Myriam Verreault
